data.event: RICHLAND ” A one-vehicle accident occurring about 4 a.m. Sunday morning claimed the life of Robin Garcia, 32, of Columbus.

event.title: 2003 pickup 1/2 mile west of Richland on Highway 30 when the vehicle left

data.event: According to a report from the Colfax County Sheriff’s Department, Garcia was eastbound, driving a 2003 pickup 1/2 mile west of Richland on Highway 30 when the vehicle left the road, overturned and rolled several times.
